# Analysis on Different Occupations
There are many different kinds of occupations in New York City. They have their own characteristics in terms of race composition, age composition, geographical distribution, and changing trends over time. In this chapter, we will analyze in detail the different characteristics of various occupations in New York City from these perspectives. We will also study on whether different occupations have relations with others.
